attributes.action: instruct the appropriate minister to ORDER the Bank of England to release all the £5 notes in its vaults
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I recently read that the Bank of England has a considerable number of these notes in its vaults but that it will not release them because high-street banks do not put £5 notes in their ATMs.  Be that as it may presumably these banks do have £5 notes in their tills; the Bank of England could therefore release its notes for that purpose.  The main reason for this petition is my frustration at so often receiving pound coins, rather than £5 notes, in my change when I pay for my shopping; why is it apparently not possible to supply shops with more £5 notes?
